resources.displayName: Enables A Seller To Create An Unpaid Item Case Against A Buyer Or To Cancel A Single Line Item Order

params.name: DisputeExplanation
params.displayName: Gives The Explanation Of Why The Buyer/ Seller Opened A Case

params.name: DisputeReason
params.displayName: The Type Of Dispute Being Created

params.name: ItemID
params.displayName: Unique Identifier For An eBay Item Listing

params.name: OrderLineItemID
params.displayName: Unique Identifier Of An Order Line Item & Is Based Upon The Concatenation Of ItemID & TransactionID

params.name: TransactionID
params.displayName: Unique Identifier Of An Order Line Item

params.name: ErrorLanguage
params.displayName: To Return Error Strings For The Call In A Different Language From The Language Commonly Associated With The Site

params.name: MessageID
params.displayName: Tracks A Response

params.name: Version
params.displayName: Version Number Of The API Code That You Are Programming Against

params.name: WarningLevel
params.displayName: Controls Whether Or Not To Return Warnings When The App Passes Unrecognized/ Deprecated Elements

resources.displayName: Allows A Seller To Respond To An Item Not Received Dispute Opened By A Buyer Through PayPal's Purchase Protection Program Or To Update An Unpaid Item Dispute

params.name: DisputeActivity
params.displayName: Type Of Activity The Seller Is Taking On The Dispute

params.name: DisputeID
params.displayName: Unique Identifier Of The eBay Or PayPal Dispute

params.name: MessageText
params.displayName: Text Of A Comment/ Response Being Posted To The Dispute

params.name: ShipmentTrackNumber
params.displayName: Tracking Number Associated With One Package Of A Shipment

params.name: ShippingCarrierUsed
params.displayName: Shipping Carrier Used To Ship The Item In Dispute

params.name: ShippingTime
params.displayName: Timestamp Indicates The Date & Time When The Item Under Dispute Was Shipped

params.name: ErrorLanguage
params.displayName: ErrorLanguage To Return Error Strings For The Call In A Different Language From The Language Commonly Associated With The Site

params.name: MessageID
params.displayName: Tracks A Response

params.name: Version
params.displayName: Version Number Of The API Code That You Are Programming Against

params.name: WarningLevel
params.displayName: Controls Whether Or Not To Return Warnings When The App Passes Unrecognized/ Deprecated Elements

resources.displayName: To Define & List A New Fixed-Price Item

params.name: Item
params.displayName: Root Container Holding All Values That Define A New Fixed-Price Listing

params.name: Item.ApplicationData
params.displayName: Returns Custom, Application-Specific Data Associated With The Item

params.name: Item.AutoPay
params.displayName: Create A Requirement That A Buyer Pays Immediately (Through PayPal Or PaisaPay) For An Auction (Buy It Now Only) Or Fixed-Price Item

params.name: Item.BestOfferDetails
params.displayName: Enable The Best Offer Feature On A Listing

params.name: Item.BestOfferDetails.BestOfferEnabled
params.displayName: Indicates Whether Or Not Best Offer Feature Is Enabled For This Item

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails
params.displayName: When This Container Is Present In An AddItem/ AddFixedPriceItem Call, All Buyer Requirements For The Resulting Listing Are Set By This Container

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.LinkedPayPalAccount
params.displayName: Seller Includes & Sets This Field To 'True' As A Mechanism To Block Bidders Who Do Not Have A PayPal Account Linked To Their eBay Account

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MaximumBuyerPolicyViolations
params.displayName: Seller Uses This As A Mechanism To Block Prospective Buyers Who Have One Or More Buyer Policy Violations On Their Account During A Specified Time Period

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MaximumBuyerPolicyViolations.Count
params.displayName: Sets The Max Number Of Buyer Policy Violations That A Prospective Buyer Is Allowed To Have During A Specified Time Period Before Being Blocked From Buying/Bidding On The Item

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MaximumBuyerPolicyViolations.Period
params.displayName: Defines The Length Of Time Over Which A Prospective Buyer's Buyer Policy Violations Will Be Counted

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MaximumItemRequirements
params.displayName: Seller Uses This Container As A Mechanism To Restrict The Number Of Items A Prospective Buyer Can Purchase From The Seller During A 10-Day Period

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MaximumItemRequirements.MaximumItemCount
params.displayName: Value Of This Field Specifies The Max Number Of Items A Prospective Buyer Can Purchase From The Seller During A 10-Day Period

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MaximumItemRequirements.MinimumFeedbackScore
params.displayName: Prospective Buyer Is Blocked From Bidding/Buying If They Have Reached/ Exceeded The MaximumItemCount & Their Feedback Score Is Less Than The Value Of This Field

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MaximumUnpaidItemStrikesInfo
params.displayName: Uses This To Block Prospective Buyers Who Have One Or More Unpaid Item Strikes On Their Account During A Specified Time Period

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MaximumUnpaidItemStrikesInfo.Count
params.displayName: Sets The Max Number Of Unpaid Item Strikes That A Prospective Buyer Is Allowed To Have During A Specified Time Period Before Being Blocked From Buying/Bidding On The Item

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MaximumUnpaidItemStrikesInfo.Period
params.displayName: Defines Length Of Time Over Which A Prospective Buyer's Unpaid Item Strikes Will Be Counted

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.MinimumFeedbackScore
params.displayName: Seller Includes This Field As A Mechanism To Block Bidders Who Have A Feedback Score Less Than The Specified Value

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.ShipToRegistrationCountry
params.displayName: Block Bidders Who Reside (According To Their eBay Primary Shipping Address) In Countries That Are On The Ship-To Exclusion List

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.VerifiedUserRequirements
params.displayName: Seller Uses This As A Mechanism To Block Prospective Buyers Who Are Not Verified Users On PayPal, Or In The Case Of eBay India, Not Verified Users On PaisaPay

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.VerifiedUserRequirements.MinimumFeedbackScore
params.displayName: To Block Verified Users Who Have A Feedback Score Less Than The Specified Value

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.VerifiedUserRequirements.VerifiedUser
params.displayName: To Block Non-Verified Users From Buying/Bidding On Their Items, The Seller Should Include This Field & Set Its Value To True

params.name: Item.BuyerRequirementDetails.ZeroFeedbackScore
params.displayName: Only Available To Sellers On The China Site & Is Only Applicable To Fixed-Price/ Auction Buy It Now Items

params.name: Item.CategoryBasedAttributesPrefill
params.displayName: Field Is Included In The Request & Set To 'True', eBay Will Auto-Fill Some Of A Listing's Item Specifics Values Based On The Listing's Category (Or Categories)

params.name: Item.CategoryMappingAllowed
params.displayName: Controls How eBay Handles Cases In Which An Category ID Specified In PrimaryCategory & Or SecondaryCategory No Longer Exists In The Current Category Structure

params.name: Item.Charity
params.displayName: Identifies A Giving Works Listing & The Benefiting Nonprofit Charity Organization Selected By The Charity Seller (If Any)

params.name: Item.Charity.CharityID
params.displayName: Unique ID Number Assigned By eBay To Registered Nonprofit Charity Organizations

params.name: Item.Charity.CharityNumber
params.displayName: Unique ID Assigned To A Nonprofit Charity Organization

params.name: Item.Charity.DonationPercent
params.displayName: Percentage Of The Purchase Price That The Seller Chooses To Donate To The Selected Nonprofit Organization

params.name: Item.ConditionDescription
params.displayName: Used By The Seller To More Clearly Describe The Condition Of Items That Are Not Brand New

params.name: Item.Country
params.displayName: Two-Letter Code That Represents The Country In Which The Item Is Located

params.name: Item.CrossBorderTrade
params.displayName: Used By Sellers Who Want Their Listing To Be Returned In The Search Results For Other eBay Sites

params.name: Item.Currency
params.displayName: Currency Associated With The Item's Price info. 3-Letter ISO 4217 Currency Code That Corresponds To The Site Specified In The Listing Request

params.name: Item.Description
params.displayName: Used By The Seller To Provide A Description Of The Item. In Listing Requests, You Can Submit Your Description Using CDATA If You Want To Use HTML Or XML-Reserved Characters In The Description

params.name: Item.DisableBuyerRequirements
params.displayName: If True All Buyer Requirements Are Ignored

params.name: Item.DiscountPriceInfo
params.displayName: This Container Provides Info For An Item That Has A Strikethrough Price (STP) Or A Min Advertised Price (MAP) Discount Pricing Treatment

params.name: Item.DiscountPriceInfo.MadeForOutletComparisonPrice
params.displayName: Applicable Only If The Item Was Specifically Made For Sale Through Dedicated eBay Outlet Pages

params.name: Item.DiscountPriceInfo.MinimumAdvertisedPrice
params.displayName: Minimum Advertised Price (MAP) Is An Agreement Between Suppliers (Or Manufacturers (OEM)) & The Retailers (Sellers) Stipulating The Lowest Price An Item Is Allowed To Be Advertised At

params.name: Item.DiscountPriceInfo.MinimumAdvertisedPriceExposure
params.displayName: Buyer Can Either Click On A Pop-Up On eBay's View Item Page Or The Discount Price Will Be Shown During Checkout

params.name: Item.DiscountPriceInfo.OriginalRetailPrice
params.displayName: Compare The StartPrice/BuyItNowPrice To OriginalRetailPrice To Determine The Amount Of Savings To The Buyer

params.name: Item.DiscountPriceInfo.SoldOffeBay
params.displayName: Used By The eBay UK & eBay Germany Sites, This Flag Indicates That The Discount Price (Specified As StartPrice)

params.name: Item.DiscountPriceInfo.SoldOneBay
params.displayName: Item Discount Price Info Sold One Bay

params.name: Item.DispatchTimeMax
params.displayName: Specifies The Max Number Of Business Days The Seller Commits To For Preparing An Item To Be Shipped After Receiving A Cleared Payment

params.name: Item.eBayNowEligible
params.displayName: Add/Revise/Relist Calls To Enable The Listing For eBay Now Delivery

params.name: Item.GiftIcon
params.displayName: GiftIcon Must Be Included At Listing Time & Set To '1' To Be Able To Use One Or More GiftServices Options

params.name: Item.GiftServices
params.displayName: Field Allows The Seller To Offer Optional Gift Services To The Buyer

params.name: Item.HitCounter
params.displayName: Indicates Whether An Optional Hit Counter Is Displayed On The Item's Listing Page & If So, What Type

params.name: Item.IncludeRecommendations
params.displayName: Included & Set To True In The Request Of An Add/Revise/Relist/Verify API Call, The Call Response Will Include Any Listing Recommendations That Will Help The Seller Improve The Quality Of The Listing

params.name: Item.InventoryTrackingMethod
params.displayName: Indicates Whether You Prefer To Track Your eBay Listings By eBay Item ID Or By Your Own SKU

params.name: Item.ItemCompatibilityList
params.displayName: A List Of Parts Compatibility Info Specified As Name & Value Pairs

params.name: Item.ItemCompatibilityList.Compatibility
params.displayName: Details For An Individual Compatible App, Consisting Of The Name-Value Pair & Related Compatibility Notes

params.name: Item.ItemCompatibilityList.Compatibility.CompatibilityNotes
params.displayName: To Specify The Placement Of The Part On A Vehicle Or The Type Of Vehicle A Part Fits

params.name: Item.ItemCompatibilityList.Compatibility.NameValueList
params.displayName: A Name-Value Pair Describing A Single Compatible Application

params.name: Item.ItemCompatibilityList.Compatibility.NameValueList.Name
params.displayName: A Name In A Name/Value Pair

params.name: Item.ItemCompatibilityList.Compatibility.NameValueList.Value
params.displayName: A Value Associated With The Name

params.name: Item.ItemSpecifics
params.displayName: A List Of Item Specific Name & Value Pairs That The Seller Specified For The Item

params.name: Item.ItemSpecifics.NameValueList
params.displayName: Item Specifics Name Value List

params.name: Item.ItemSpecifics.NameValueList.Name
params.displayName: A Name In A Name/Value Pair

params.name: Item.ItemSpecifics.NameValueList.Value
params.displayName: A Value Associated With The Name

params.name: Item.ListingCheckoutRedirectPreference
params.displayName: Container Consisting Of The ProStores Store Name & User Name

params.name: Item.ListingCheckoutRedirectPreference.ProStoresStoreName
params.displayName: The Name Of The ProStores Store

params.name: Item.ListingCheckoutRedirectPreference.SellerThirdPartyUsername
params.displayName: The Username Of The ProStores Store

params.name: Item.ListingDesigner
params.displayName: Contains Detail Data For The Listing Designer Theme & Template, Which Can Optionally Be Used To Enhance The Appearance Of The Description Area Of An Item's Description

params.name: Item.ListingDesigner.LayoutID
params.displayName: Identifies The Layout Template To Use When Displaying The Item's Description

params.name: Item.ListingDesigner.OptimalPictureSize
params.displayName: If True, Indicates That The Item's Picture Will Be Enlarged To Fit Description Of The Item

params.name: Item.ListingDesigner.ThemeID
params.displayName: ID For The Listing Designer Theme Template To Use When Displaying The Item's Description

params.name: Item.ListingDetails
params.displayName: Various Details About A Listing, Some Of Which Sre Calculated Or Derived After The Item Is Listed

params.name: Item.ListingDetails.BestOfferAutoAcceptPrice
params.displayName: The Price At Which Best Offers Are Automatically Accepted

params.name: Item.ListingDetails.LocalListingDistance
params.displayName: Specifies A Distance (In Miles) Used As The Radius Of The Area About The Supplied Postal Code That Constitutes The Local Market

params.name: Item.ListingDetails.MinimumBestOfferPrice
params.displayName: Specifies The Min Acceptable Best Offer Price

params.name: Item.ListingDuration
params.displayName: Describes Number Of Days Seller Wants The Listing To Be Active (Available For Bidding/Buying)

params.name: Item.ListingEnhancement
params.displayName: Used By Seller To Activate One Or More Listing Upgrades For A Listing, Such As A Bold Title, A Subtitle, Or A Value Pack Bundle

params.name: Item.ListingType
params.displayName: Format Of The Listing The Seller Wants To Use, Such As Auction Style Or Fixed Price

params.name: Item.Location
params.displayName: Indicates Geographical Location Of The Item (Along With Country) To Be Displayed On eBay Listing Pages

params.name: Item.PaymentMethods
params.displayName: Identifies Payment Method (Such As PayPal) That The Seller Will Accept When The Buyer Pays For The Item

params.name: Item.PayPalEmailAddress
params.displayName: Valid PayPal Email Address For The PayPal Account That The Seller Will Use If They Offer PayPal As A Payment Method For The Listing

params.name: Item.PickupInStoreDetails
params.displayName: Used In Add/Revise/Relist Calls To Enable The Listing For In-Store Pickup Via The EligibleForPickupInStore Boolean Field

params.name: Item.PickupInStoreDetails.EligibleForPickupDropOff
params.displayName: Used In Add/Revise/Relist Calls To Enable The Listing For The (Click & Collect) Feature

params.name: Item.PickupInStoreDetails.EligibleForPickupInStore
params.displayName: Used In Add/Revise/Relist Calls To Enable The Listing For In-Store Pickup

params.name: Item.PictureDetails
params.displayName: Contains The Data For Pictures Associated With An Item

params.name: Item.PictureDetails.GalleryDuration
params.displayName: Number Of Days That The Featured Gallery Type Applies To A Listing

params.name: Specifies The Gallery Enhancement Type For The Listing
params.displayName: Available Items Only

params.name: Item.PictureDetails.GalleryURL
params.displayName: The Gallery Image Is Always The First PictureURL Passed In & This Field Is Set To That Value

params.name: Item.PictureDetails.PhotoDisplay
params.displayName: Specifies The Type Of Image Display Used In A Listing

params.name: Item.PictureDetails.PictureSource
params.displayName: This Info Is Primarily Useful For Picture Manager Subscribers, Who Pay A Flat Subscription Fee Instead of individual picture fees per listing

params.name: Item.PictureDetails.PictureURL
params.displayName: Contains URL For A Picture Of The Item

params.name: Item.PostalCode
params.displayName: Postal Code Of The Place Where The Item Is Located

params.name: Item.PostCheckoutExperienceEnabled
params.displayName: Reserved For Future Use

params.name: Item.PrimaryCategory
params.displayName: Category ID For The First (Or Only) Category In Which The Item Is Listed (Or Will Be Listed, If The Item Is New)

params.name: Item.PrimaryCategory.CategoryID
params.displayName: Distinct Numeric ID For A Category On eBay

params.name: Item.PrivateListing
params.displayName: Used By Seller In The Add/Relist/Revise Family Of Calls To Obscure Item Title, Item ID, & Item Price From Post-Order Feedback Comments Left By Buyers

params.name: Item.PrivateNotes
params.displayName: A Note A User Makes On An Item In Their My eBay Account

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails
params.displayName: Specifies Stock Product Info To Include In A Listing

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.BrandMPN
params.displayName: The Combo Of Brand & MPN (Manufacturer Part Number) Can Be Used As A Unique Identifier For A Product

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.BrandMPN.Brand
params.displayName: The Brand Of The Product

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.BrandMPN.MPN
params.displayName: The Manufacturer Part Number Of The Product

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.EAN
params.displayName: EAN (European Article Number) Is A Unique 8 or 13 Digit Identifier That Many Industries (Such As Book Publishers) Use To Identify Products

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.IncludePrefilledItemInformation
params.displayName: If True, Specifies That The Listing Should Include Additional Information About The Product, Such As A Publisher's Description Or Film Credits

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.IncludeStockPhotoURL
params.displayName: When Set To True In The Add/Relist/Revise Calls, Causes Stock Photo Of The Item (If Available) To Be Used In The Listing

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.ISBN
params.displayName: ISBN (International Standard Book Number) Unique 10-13-Character Id For Books

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.ProductID
params.displayName: eBay's Unique Identifier For A Specific Version Of A Product

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.ProductReferenceID
params.displayName: eBay's Short Global Reference ID For A Catalog Product

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.ReturnSearchResultOnDuplicates
params.displayName: Indicates What eBay Should Do If More Than One Product Matches The External Product ID (ISBN, UPC, EAN, BrandMPN, or TicketListingDetails)

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.TicketListingDetails
params.displayName: Only Applicable When You Are Listing Event Tickets

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.TicketListingDetails.EventTitle
params.displayName: The Name Of The Event, As Shown On The Ticket

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.TicketListingDetails.PrintedDate
params.displayName: The Date Of The Event, As Shown On The Ticket

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.TicketListingDetails.PrintedTime
params.displayName: The Time Of The Event, As Shown On The Ticket

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.TicketListingDetails.Venue
params.displayName: The Name Of The Venue, As Shown On The Ticket

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.UPC
params.displayName: UPC (Universal Product Code) Is A Unique, 12-Character Identifier That Many Industries Use To Identify Products

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.UseFirstProduct
params.displayName: Indicates What eBay Should Do If More Than One Product In The eBay Product Catalog Matches The External Product ID (ISBN, UPC, EAN, BrandMPN, or TicketListingDetails)

params.name: Item.ProductListingDetails.UseStockPhotoURLAsGallery
params.displayName: If Set To True, Causes The Stock Photo Of The Item To Be Used As The Gallery Thumbnail

params.name: Item.Quantity
params.displayName: The Value Indicates Quantity Of Items Available For Purchase In The Listing

params.name: Item.QuantityInfo
params.displayName: Used To Set The Min Number Of Event Tickets That Should Remain Available After A Buyer Makes A Purchase

params.name: Item.QuantityInfo.MinimumRemnantSet
params.displayName: Enables The Seller To Avoid Being Left With 1 Item In Your Listing

params.name: Item.QuantityRestrictionPerBuyer
params.displayName: Seller To Restrict The Quantity Of Items That May Be Purchased By One Buyer During The Duration Of A Fixed-Price Listing (Single Or Multi-Variation)

params.name: Item.QuantityRestrictionPerBuyer.MaximumQuantity
params.displayName: Indicates Maximum Quantity Of Items That A Single Buyer May Purchase During Duration Of A Fixed-Price Listing (Single/ Multi-Variation)

params.name: Item.ReturnPolicy
params.displayName: Container That Describes The Seller's Return Policy

params.name: Item.ReturnPolicy.Description
params.displayName: Explanation Of Seller's Return Policy

params.name: Item.ReturnPolicy.EAN
params.displayName: The European Article Number (EAN) Associated With Item, If Any

params.name: Item.ReturnPolicy.ExtendedHolidayReturns
params.displayName: Enables A Holiday Returns Policy For The Item

params.name: Item.ReturnPolicy.RefundOption
params.displayName: Indicates How The Seller Will Compensate The Buyer For A Returned Item

params.name: Item.ReturnPolicy.RestockingFeeValueOption
params.displayName: Indicates The Restocking Fee Charged By The Seller For Returned Items

params.displayName: Specifies Whether Or Not To Remove Duplicate Items From Search Results
